author: timbeiko
content:
Heads up: we're organizing a breakout room to discuss post-merge MEV support at the consensus layer on the off week of the PoS implementers' call, December 9th. Agenda here: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/423

The <#874767108809031740> is available to discuss the topics linked in the agenda prior to the call. It would be valuable if folks from most consensus client teams could make it!
